      • Character

        public Character(java.lang.String path,
         int sWidth,
         int sHeight,
         int[] sequence,
         int timeFrame,
         Level level)
        This constructor is the main one
        Parameters:
        path - is the path to the sprite sheet for the character (usually "img/XXX.png")
        sWidth - is the width of one sprite
        sHeight - is the height of one sprite
        sequence - is the sequence of sprites that makes his walk
        timeFrame - is the refreshing time for the animation
        level - level is the level the character is playing in

        public void setMove(char c)
        This function is called by MyKeyListener to set a move to the character
        Parameters:
        c - is the kind of move to set to the character

      • setCrawling

        public void setCrawling(boolean b)
        This function set if the character is crawling or not
        Parameters:
        b - is the boolean value (crawling or not)

        public void pause()

      • update

        public void update(long time)
        This method is called every time we want to print the character on the screen. We test the refreshment time before doing anything
        Parameters:
        time - is the current time of the game
